result.title: Final update of the Dissemination and Exploitation Plan
result.description: Update of the protocols as there is an obligation for partners to carry out exploitation for another four years after the project. The Knowledge Output Pathways and Knowledge Transfer Plans are included. An update of the Horizon Results Platform and information about that in the DEP.

result.title: Publicly accessible database platform and web interface released
result.description: A validated public access platform will be made openly available to the general public. The open beta platform will be validated using case studies from all WP1 participating partners. The platform will have the ability to accept new submissions and support all functionality analysis and all prototype bugs will be addressed.
